    1  ng build --prod --output-path docs --base-href https://apon77.github.io/pixelplusui/
    2  echo n | sudo npm install -g @angular/cli@latest
    3  ng build --prod --output-path docs --base-href https://apon77.github.io/pixelplusui/ 
    4  git clone https://github.com/pixie-codes/pixelplusui
    5  cd pixelplusui/
    6  ng build --prod --output-path docs --base-href https://apon77.github.io/pixelplusui/ 
    7  echo n | sudo npm install --save-dev @angular-devkit/build-angular
    8  ng build --prod --output-path docs --base-href https://apon77.github.io/pixelplusui/
    9  git status\
   10  git status
   11  cp docs/index.html docs/404.html
   12  git status
   13  git add .
   14  git status
   15  git commit -m "Updating site"
   16    git config --global user.email "you@example.com"
   17    git config --global user.name "Your Name"
   18  git commit -m "Updating site"
   19  git log
   20  git push fine
   21  history
   22  cd docks
   23  cd docs
   24  ls
   25  cd ..
   26  ls
   27  history > history.txt
